by_date_created.map:
function(doc) 
{ 
	emit
	( 
		doc.date_created,
		{
			type:'pmss',
			host_state:doc.host_state,
			pmssno:doc.tracking.admin_info.pmssno,
      death_certificate_number:doc.tracking.death_certificate_number,
			dod:doc.tracking.date_of_death.dod,
			dob:doc.demographic.dob,
			residence_zip: doc.tracking.q9.reszip,
      mage:doc.demographic.mage,
      manner:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.manner_dc,
      cod1a:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.cod1a_dc,
      cod1b:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.cod1b_dc,
      cod1c:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.cod1c_dc,
      cod1d:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.cod1d_dc,
      cod_other_condition:doc.ije_dc.cause_details.othercondition_dc,
      classification:doc.cause_of_death.class,           
			jurisdiction:doc.tracking.admin_info.jurisdiction,
			case_folder:doc.tracking.admin_info.case_folder,
			track_year:doc.tracking.admin_info.track_year,
			med_coder_check: doc.tracking.admin_info.med_coder_check,
			med_dir_check:doc.tracking.admin_info.med_dir_check,
			status:doc.tracking.admin_info.status,
			month_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.month,
			day_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.day,
			year_of_death:doc.tracking.date_of_death.year,
			month_of_birth:doc.demographic.date_of_birth.month,
			day_of_birth:doc.demographic.date_of_birth.day,
			year_of_birth:doc.demographic.date_of_birth.year,
			agreement_status:doc.committee_review.agreement_grp.agreement_status,
			version: doc.version,
			date_created: doc.date_created,
			created_by: doc.created_by,
			date_last_updated: doc.date_last_updated,
			last_updated_by: doc.last_updated_by,
			date_last_checked_out: doc.date_last_checked_out,
			last_checked_out_by: doc.last_checked_out_by
		}
	);
	
}
